answers.author: Verna McDaniel
answers.text:
Washtenaw County only allows by policy position creations or modifications for reclassifications during two periods. 1. Budget time (we have a biennial budget process but next year we start a quadriennial budget) or 2. During union negotiations (we had 2 year labor contracts but next year we have 10 year contracts).  They must submitted through a "Position Description Questionnaire" to HR.  The PDQ must be reviewed by the department head with sign off if they agree.  Other position creations outside of this process must indicate a revenue source other than the general fund.
